About Me

Let me tell you something...

HI THERE!

I'm an Undergraduate student and practising video game development since 2018. I have an intermediate skill set in game programming and 3D modelling(skilled in Unity3D). I'm creative, positive minded and very passionate about video games. Looking for opportunities and happy to work together as well.

TECHNICAL SKILLS

Unity3D, C#, C, Blender, Marmoset Hexels, HTML5, CSS3, Gimp.

EDUCATION

HOBBIES

Astronomy, Video games, Arts and Craft, Reading, Pixel arts, 3D Modelling, Digital Artworks.

INTERESTS

Apart from developing games, I love to play a lot of video games which brings me inspiration to develop games and also love to analyse them. I also like to do character designs, 3D modelling, game assets and some pixel arts. I follow a lot of sci-fi genre movies and television shows.

My special interests apart from games and arts are physics and astronomy. I spend a lot of free time to understand the Universe and it's existence (from Big-bang to today) and also love to read Einstein's most mind-boggling theories (Theory of Relativity).
